Package lubiku.castleQuest.Controller.Managers

Class NPCManager

java.lang.Object
lubiku.castleQuest.Model.Parents.Entity
lubiku.castleQuest.Model.NPC.NPC
lubiku.castleQuest.Controller.Managers.NPCManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Configurator
public class NPCManager extends NPC implements Configurator

NPCManager

The NPCManager class manages and configures Non-Playable Characters (NPCs) in the game. It extends the NPC class and implements the Configurator interface. It handles loading NPC sprites, configuring NPC attributes, and managing NPC position and speed.

      public void constructNPCSprites()

      constructNPCSprites

      Constructs the NPC sprites by loading them from their respective image paths. Sets up the NPC's sprites for different directions (up, down, left, right).
